function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Connectivity of medical tools and devices through the internet","category":"Communication Network","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Iot devices and healthcare networks can be vulnerable to cyber attacks, leading to unauthorized access and manipulation of critical medical data.","category":"Communication Network","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Data storage and management challenges for the massive amount of data generated by iot devices in healthcare","category":"Communication Network","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of adequate and organized facilities","category":"Dwelling","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Underutilization of ioht/iomt","category":"Communication Network","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Potential for the transmission of contagious diseases through interconnected devices and networks.","category":"Communication Network","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of effective surveillance systems for infectious disease outbreaks","category":"Communication Network","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of analytical tools for cost-effective, sensitive, and selective analysis of biomarker groups","category":"Communication Network","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Variability in efficiency of dna/rna extraction from pcr inhibitor rich samples","category":"Water","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Uncertainty in the suitability of dpcr for certain sample types","category":"Water","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"High mutation rates of rna viruses may lead to rapid adaptation and spread in new host populations.","category":"Air","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Sewage system containing complex microbial communities","category":"Water","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Influence of wastewater composition on hydrochemical parameters","category":"Water","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Uncertainties associated with sample collection and analytical variability","category":"Water","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Potential contamination of water sources with harmful chemicals or biological compounds.","category":"Water","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Laboratory facilities becoming overwhelmed during epidemics","category":"Dwelling","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Significant time-lag between data collection and analysis","category":"Communication Network","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Variability in disease monitoring techniques and resources","category":"Communication Network","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"High risk of viral spreading within households due to close contact","category":"Dwelling","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Mental health and well-being of individuals due to prolonged social isolation","category":"Dwelling","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Transferability of the model to other societies","category":"Settlement","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Hard-coded social constructs and periodic routines may not accurately represent real-world behavior, leading to unrealistic simulation outcomes.","category":"Settlement","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"High mobility of people increasing the probability of approaching infected individuals","category":"Mobility Network","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Limited medical infrastructure for hospitalization cases","category":"Dwelling","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Highly contagious covid-19 disease","category":"Air","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Mobility patterns of a1 agents","category":"Mobility Network","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"High urban density contributes to increased risk of contagious disease spread","category":"Settlement","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Large household size increases the risk of disease transmission within families","category":"Dwelling","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Higher population size correlates with greater potential for disease exposure","category":"Settlement","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"The table provides summary statistics on globalisation, settlement characteristics, and population variables, which may contain data that is predictive of disease propagation.","category":"Settlement","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of accessibility of smaller settlements contributes to disease diffusion","category":"Settlement","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Population aged 65 and over is associated with higher case detection","category":"Settlement","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"High urbanization rate and population density leading to rapid disease diffusion in cities","category":"Settlement","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Heterogeneous human settlement characteristics impacting epidemic spread","category":"Settlement","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inherent geographical processes in the spread of infectious diseases","category":"Settlement","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Limited containment in isolated regions","category":"Settlement","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of immunity and effective vaccine for covid-19","category":"Settlement","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Dependence on mass video surveillance for monitoring social distancing","category":"Communication Network","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"High reliance on deep learning-based solutions for monitoring social distancing","category":"Communication Network","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Noisy precision / recall curve may make it difficult to estimate model performance for object detection.","category":"Communication Network","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Change in computation method for ap by pascal voc challenge may lead to discrepancies in model evaluation.","category":"Communication Network","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Use of multiple detection models may lead to varied performance results and difficulty in comparing model effectiveness.","category":"Communication Network","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Use of threshold for classification based on iou","category":"Communication Network","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"False positive predictions due to iou threshold","category":"Communication Network","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"False negative predictions due to iou threshold","category":"Communication Network","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inaccurate object detection leading to incorrect measurements","category":"Communication Network","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inaccurate pedestrian detection and distance calculation","category":"Mobility Network","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Dependence on deep learning technology and pre-trained models for medical diagnosis and other critical tasks","category":"Communication Network","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Decentralized iot-based system for regulating population flow during covid-19 lockdown","category":"Communication Network","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Social distancing monitoring schemes using robots and surveillance technology","category":"Communication Network","confidence":"Medium"}]}
